title: JavaScript Basic to Advanced Full Notes
description: My JavaScript notes cover everything from the basics to advanced topics, including variables, data types, functions, DOM manipulation, ES6+ features, asynchronous programming, and more. Perfect for learners looking to master both fundamental and modern JavaScript concepts.

title: React Essentials and Advanced Guide
description: These notes dive into React essentials, from JSX and components to state management, hooks, and performance optimization. Ideal for developers aiming to build scalable and responsive applications with a solid understanding of React fundamentals and advanced concepts.

title: Node.js Complete Developer Notes
description: A comprehensive guide covering the basics of Node.js, asynchronous programming, REST API development, Express.js, MongoDB, and more. Perfect for backend developers eager to build server-side applications with Node.js and enhance their backend skills.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA)
description: Master DSA with these notes covering arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, sorting, and searching algorithms. Suited for those preparing for technical interviews and keen to strengthen their problem-solving skills with hands-on examples in JavaScript.
